title: Extreme Motorcycle Art
features: This lavishly illustrated book showcases more than fifty of the top international motorcycle artists, studios, custom bike-builders and bike shops, capturing the amazing creativity that has come to characterize the custom bike-painting genre. It features stunning photographs of the completed bikes, close-ups of the artworks and full contact information for every artist.
description: Spencer Drate and Judith Alavetz are award-winning creative directors, designers and authors who have worked on numerous books, as well as album covers and CD packages.
store: Spencer Drate (Author),  Judith Salavetz (Author),  Ernie Lopez (Foreword)
